duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide social services support to residents in Panorama Independent Living, collaborating with residents, families, and interdisciplinary teams to ensure emotional and social needs are met.
Educate and consult Independent Living residents and families on available services and community resources.
Assist residents with transitions of care to Assisted Living and Convalescent and Rehabilitation.
Act as an advocate and liaison for residents, appropriately assess and respond to referrals and crises.
Maintain professional, confidential, and timely progress notes of services provided to residents.
Collaborate with staff to coordinate services to residents between levels of care, facilitate support group meetings for residents, and participate in various forums and webinars.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Psychology, Social Work, Gerontology, or related field (Relevant experience preferred). Working knowledge of Medicare, Medicaid, LTC insurance, and supportive services.
